sections.name: server
sections.label: which server to install - if akka - akka, otherwise kafka (server)

variables.name: data|datadirectory
variables.label: Data.zip location - The location of the data.zip location (data|datadirectory)
variables.description: The location of the data.zip location

variables.name: image|akka
variables.label: Application image for akka based implementation - Name of the akka application image (image|akka)
variables.description: Name of the akka application image

variables.name: image|kafka
variables.label: Application image for kafka based implementation - Name of the kafka application image (image|kafka)
variables.description: Name of the kafka application image

variables.name: image|publisher
variables.label: Publisher image - Name of the loader image (image|publisher)

variables.name: image|pullPolicy
variables.label: Image pull policy - Image pull policy (image|pullPolicy)

variables.name: image|version
variables.label: Image version - Image version should correspond to the FDP version (image|version)
variables.description: Image version should correspond to the FDP version

variables.name: configuration|kafka|brokerlist
variables.label: List of brokers to connect to - Coma separated list of brokers to connect to (configuration|kafka|brokerlist)
variables.description: Coma separated list of brokers to connect to

variables.name: configuration|publisher|data_publish_interval
variables.label: Data publish interval - Data publish interval, for example 1 sec (configuration|publisher|data_publish_interval)
variables.description: Data publish interval, for example 1 sec

variables.name: configuration|publisher|model_publish_interval
variables.label: Model publish interval - Model publish interval, for example 5 minutes (configuration|publisher|model_publish_interval)
variables.description: Model publish interval, for example 5 minutes

variables.name: configuration|publisher|data_mount
variables.label: Data mount point for publisher data - Data mount point for publisher data (configuration|publisher|data_mount)
variables.description: Data mount point for publisher data

variables.name: configuration|publisher|data_file
variables.label: Name of the publisher data file - Name of the publisher data file (configuration|publisher|data_file)
variables.description: Name of the publisher data file

variables.name: server|type
variables.label: server type - which server to install - if akka - akka, otherwise kafka (server|type)
variables.description: which server to install - if akka - akka, otherwise kafka
